oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: John T. Wilder corresondence with Martha Wilder, 1862 September 12
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Wilder, John Thomas, 1830-1917
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter from J. T. Wilder to his wife Martha briefly describing his new duties commanding 2600 men and supervising African American laborers in preparation for the Battle of Munfordville.
